title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - McVay Future, Westbrook Credit + Week 9 ‘Sharp’ or ‘Square’
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - McVay Future, Westbrook Credit + Week 9 ‘Sharp’ or ‘Square’
description:
First, Colin explains why he’s confused by constant rumors about Sean McVay retiring from coaching, why Russell Westbrook deserves a ton of credit, and why he rolls his eyes at media bellyaching over Elon Musk’s Twitter takeover.

Then the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 9 picks are "sharp" or "square". They look at Chargers/Falcons (17:00), Vikings/Commanders (19:00), Packers/Lions (22:00), Dolphins/Bears (24:00), Ravens/Saints (26:00), Colts/Patriots (28:00), Raiders/Jags (31:00), and Seahawks/Cardinals (32:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates, and visit FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
